name: latest_in_chosen_currency
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool live_metal_prices.
Tool description: Live prices for Gold, Silver, Palladium and Platinum in 160+ currencies including USD, GBP and EUR.
API description: Select what you need for a smaller payload! Real-time Gold, Silver, Palladium, Platinum and 160+ currency rates based on selected Currency

requestedsymbols.description: Symbols of the metals for which the prices are requested (e.g., 'gold', 'silver').

requestedcurrency.description: The currency in which the metal prices should be returned (e.g., 'USD', 'EUR').
